cast.original_title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
cast.overview: A group of strangers come across a man dying after a car crash who proceeds to tell them about the $350,000 he buried in California. What follows is the madcap adventures of those strangers as each attempts to claim the prize for himself.
cast.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

John Clarke (April 14, 1931 – October 16, 2019) was an American actor. Clarke is recognized for originating and portraying Mickey Horton on the NBC soap opera Days of Our Lives for 39 years, beginning with the debut of the program in 1965, until his retirement in 2004. He was nominated for the 1979 Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Actor in a Daytime Drama Series. In 2015 he was awarded the Daytime Emmys Lifetime Achievement Award.
details.name: John Clarke
